    Class Description
    AddAppointmentController
    This class handles the logic for the add appointment form.
    AddCustomerController
    This class handles the logic for the add customer form.
    AlertHelper
    This class displays alert messages in the UI.
    AllAppointmentsController
    This class handles the logic for the Customer Schedule view.
    Appointment
    This class represents a model for items from the 'appointments' database table.
    AppointmentDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and Appointment-related activities.
    Contact
    This class represents a model for items from the 'contacts' database table.
    ContactDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and Contact-related activities.
    Country
    This class represents a model for items from the 'countries' database table.
    CountryDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and Country-related activities.
    Customer
    This class represents a model for items from the 'customers' database table.
    CustomerDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and Customer-related activities.
    CustomerScheduleController
    This class handles the logic for the Customer Schedule view.
    DateFormatHelper
    Helper class used to display date and time formats in the UI.
    DateHelper
    Helper class used to make dealing with dates easier.
    Division
    This class represents a model for items from the 'first_level_divisions' database table.
    DivisionDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and Division-related activities.
    FormHelper
    Helper class assists in populating the form UI
    FormValidator
    This class assists in building the forms for adding/updating appointments and customers.
    JDBC
    Class for handling database connection.
    Launcher  
    LoginController
    Handles the logic for the login form.
    Main  
    MainViewController
    This class handles the logic for the main view of the application.
    MonthViewController
    This class handles the logic for displaying the current Month's appointments in the UI.
    Query
    This class acts as an interface between the client code and the database.
    Report
    This class represents a model for reports.
    ReportsController
    This class handles the logic for displaying the data reports in the UI.
    ReportsDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and Reports-related activities.
    SceneHelper
    This class is designed to assist in displaying the various scenes throughout the application.
    UpdateAppointmentController
    This class handles the logic for the edit appointment form.
    UpdateCustomerController
    This class handles the logic for the edit customer form.
    User
    This class represents a model for items from the 'users' database table.
    UserDAO
    This class handles the interfacing between the database and User-related activities.
    ValidationError
    Stores strings used in displaying error messages in the UI.
    WeekViewController
    This class handles the logic for displaying the current week's appointments in the UI.
